markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Oil of Skating](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2074)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 87 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thin, slippery oil shimmers with a golden hue. Coating your shoes or feet with _oil of skating_ enables you to skate quickly along flat surfaces for 1 hour. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed, which doubles if you move on a downhill surface. You lose this bonus if moving on difficult terrain, greater difficult terrain, or [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456). Also, you treat any uphill movement as moving on difficult terrain while your feet are oiled and treat the results of any [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks made to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) as one degree worse.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Oil of Skating
